pricing.heroTitle: Website Solutions for Schools — Simple, Fast, Reliable
pricing.heroSubtitle: We build, host, and hand you a dashboard to manage your school's website. No headaches, just results.
pricing.sectionIntro: Choose a website plan tailored for schools — each plan includes hosting, SSL, and an easy-to-use content dashboard. Upgrades and custom options available.
